title: Most popular leisure activities among adults in the U.S. 2013
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Watch TV and lowest at Response Gardening.
There is a difference of 35.0 between the maximum Response Watch TV and minimum Response Gardening.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response Watch TV has the highest Share of respondents and Gardening has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Watch TV and lowest at Response Gardening.
There is a difference of 35.0 between the maximum Response Watch TV and minimum Response Gardening.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Watch TV and lowest at Response Gardening.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 35.0.
Share of respondents at Response Watch TV is 42.0 , second place is Reading at 37.0, and thirdly is Computer/internet at 19.0.
Response Exercise/working out, and Playing video games and computer/internet games share the same value 10.0.
The Response Gardening has 2.49 times less Share of respondents than average.
The Share of respondents is 169.0 if we add up values of all Responses.

data.Response: Spending time with family and friends
Playing video games and computer/internet games
